product_name: Rocky Mountain Underground Apostle Skis - Men's - 2014/2015
long_description: Light for their size and uniquely shaped for any snow conditions, the Apostle skis are your quiver-of-one ticket to the deep snow of untracked glades and the groomers that will take you there.
short_description: Light for their size and uniquely shaped for any snow conditions, the Apostle skis are your quiver-of-one ticket to the deep snow of untracked glades and the groomers that will take you there.
